dev.metaschema.oscal.lib
 
dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model
Provides generated Metaschema binding classes for module(s): OSCAL Document Metadata Description, OSCAL Component Definition Model, OSCAL Assessment Plan Model, OSCAL Profile Model, OSCAL Assessment Results Model, OSCAL Mapping Model -- Common Models, OSCAL Implementation Common Information, OSCAL System Security Plan (SSP) Model, OSCAL Assessment Layer Format -- Common Modules, OSCAL Unified Model of Models, OSCAL Control Catalog Model, OSCAL Plan of Action and Milestones (POA&M) Model, OSCAL Control Mapping Model, OSCAL Control Catalog Format -- Common Models.
